profileField_title: Where did you go to school?
profileField_description: Whether it’s home school, high school, or trade school, name the school that made you who you are.
Share the languages you speak fluently. Example: English, Spanish, or Klingon.

profileField_title: What do you do for work?
profileField_description: Tell us what your profession is. If you don’t have a traditional job, tell us your life’s calling. Example: Nurse, parent to four kids, or retired surfer.
Share the city or town you call home. Example: San Francisco, CA or a small town in the Midwest.

profileField_title: What was your favorite song in high school?
profileField_placeholder: My favorite song in high school
profileField_description: However embarrassing, share the tune you listened to on repeat as a teenager.
Share whatever you can’t get enough of—in a good way. Example: Baking rosemary focaccia.

profileField_title: What’s a fun fact about you?
profileField_description: Share something unique or unexpected about you. Example: I was in a music video or I’m a juggler.

profileField_title: What would your biography title be?
profileField_description: If someone wrote a book about your life, what would they call it? Example: Born to Roam or Chronicles of a Dog Mom.

profileField_title: What do you spend too much time doing?
profileField_description: Share an activity or hobby you spend lots of free time on. Example: Watching cat videos or playing chess.

profileField_title: Do you have any pets in your life?
profileField_description: Share any pets you have and their names. Example: My calico cat Whiskers, or Leonardo my speedy turtle.
